title: Midi port
desc: Midi port to use for guitar input

title: Midi output port
desc: Midi port to use for output

title: Early Chord Display
desc: Show chords earlier by this percent of a beat (1.0 = 1 quarter note)

title: Common Chord Tones Time
desc: Show common chords for next chord by this percent of a beat (1.0 = 1 quarter note)

title: Neck taper
desc: The amount of neck taper for the fretboard as a percentage of the neck width

title: Fretboard outline width
desc: The line thickness of the fretboard outline

title: Fret thickness ratio
desc: Thickness of the frets as a percentage of the neck length

title: Margin size
desc: The margin size around the fretboard in pixels

title: Height ratio
desc: The height of the fretboard as a percentage of the neck length

title: Number of frets
desc: The number of frets on the fretboard

title: Initial width
desc: The initial width of the fretboard window

title: Horizontal location
desc: The initial horizontal location of the fretboard window

title: Vertical location
desc: The initial vertical location of the fretboard window

title: Maximized
desc: Start in maximized mode

title: String bridge spacing
desc: The width of the bridge box as a percentage of the neck width

title: String bridge line thickness
desc: The line thickness of the bridge box

title: String indicator width
desc: The width of the active string indicator graphic

title: String indicator height
desc: The height of the active string indicator graphic

title: String indicator color
desc: Color of the active string indicators

title: Nut width
desc: The width of the nut as a percentage of neck length

title: Nut line thickness
desc: The line thickness of the nut outline

title: Nut slot width
desc: The thickness of the nut string slots in pixels

title: String insets
desc: The amount that strings are inset from the edges of the neck as a percentage of neck width

title: Nut color
desc: Color of the nut

title: Fret color
desc: Color of the frets

title: Dot width ratio
desc: The width of the fretboard dots as a percentage of the neck length

title: Dot height ratio
desc: The height of the fretboard dots as a percentage of the neck width

title: Finger offset
desc: The offset of the finger position on the string toward the nut as a percentage of the distance between frets

title: Finger width
desc: The width of the finger indicator as a percentage of the neck length

title: Finger color
desc: Color of the finger indicator

title: Show tracers
desc: Connect notes with tracer lines to reveal patterns

title: Note fade time
desc: Note fade time in seconds

title: Note expiration
desc: Max age of note for tracer inclusion in seconds

title: Tracer fade time
desc: Tracer fade time in seconds

title: Tracer line ratio
desc: The thickness of the tracer line as a percentage of the window width (weird right?)

title: Scale file
desc: location of scale file

title: Chord file
desc: location of chord file

desc: location of pattern file

desc: location of pattern file
